24-Hour._note01: these market hours are given as a format reference only, with no suggestion of accuracy
24-Hour._note0: you are encouraged to add/edit accurate market hours as you wish, (and please open source them!)
24-Hour._note: you may add as many symbols as you want, after 'SymbolsIncluded'
24-Hour._note10: it's better to define market hours based on symbols due to the different policies of exchanges
24-Hour._note1: if you add symbols, the symbols must be the same as defined by the exchange
24-Hour._note2: you may define the exchange name arbitrarily
24-Hour._note3: the system checks on the symbols first, and if not found, checks on the exchange names
24-Hour._note4: you may define or leave out any of these time points, if that makes sense
24-Hour._note5: but you must define 'MORNING_START' for non-24-hour sessions
24-Hour._note6: if you leave out 'MORNING_START', then the system assumes it being a 24-hour session
24-Hour._note7: the order of these time points can be arbitrary
24-Hour._note8: the format of the time points must be 'HH:MM'
24-Hour._note9: 'NIGHT_END' does not equal the end of a day bar, which is defined elsewhere.
